Articles.Content:
I play ksp with mods so i play science mode , i made a probe- jool 1 to burn up and with 200% science got back 1900 science

 

Goal:make a atmospheric probe get 1500 science with 200% science or less* may include mods*

 

parameters: Must land or burn up on a atmospheric world

must send 1500 science

can use mods, no hyper edit or infinte fuel

probes plus, scan sat, Eve mods recommended*not required*

You may use a planets pack

OPM,  galaxies unbound , and new horizons are recommended as planet packs

*note,post pictures for prove,videos also are allowed*

Edited May 28, 2020 by Lostkerbalnearduna
